CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Account_Name__r.Department__c , "Dubai Logistic City" ), "Dubai Logistic City; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Account_Name__r.Department__c , "Business Center" ), "Business Center;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Account_Name__r.Department__c , "Business Park" ), "Business Park;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Account_Name__r.Department__c , "DSP" ), "DSP; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Account_Name__r.Department__c , "Aviation City" ), " Aviation City;",null )
CustomField.label: Department
